word: IN MELBOURNE AREA LATE FEB. TO EARLY APRIL; SPOKE 8 TIMES IN THE TENT IN BALACLAVA, 3 TIMES TO NO. FITZROY CHURCH ALSO TO OFFICE WORKERS; MET WEEKEND APPOINTMENTS IN GEELONG AND IN BALLARAT.  LABORED UNDER DIFFICULTIES, AS SHE WAS SUFFERING FROM MALARIA, BUT THOUGH SHE SPOKE "IN A FEEBLE VOICE" ON SABBATH AT BALLARAT, SHE WAS STRENGTHENED ON SUNDAY TO SPEAK IN A LARGE HALL FOR MORE THAN AN HOUR AND "WAS NOT THE LEAST WEARY."
